name: Ents24
tag_list: tickets, music, comedy, theatre, shows, concerts, live, uk
overview:
Ents24.com is an online guide to live entertainment and events, including music, comedy and theatre.

The company was founded in 2000, primarily as a white-label content provider, selling entertainment listings data to mobile network operators, print and online media.

Nowadays, Ents24’s focus lies in running their own consumer-facing website, which has grown to become the UK’s third most popular online ticketing destination, after Ticketmaster and See Tickets, with 2m unique users per month (sources: Hitwise/Google Analytics)

Ents24’s event database numbers 10,000 per week, submitted by event promoters, artists and venues. In addition ticket availability data is aggregated from several of the UK’s biggest online ticket sellers to provide a ‘one-stop-shop’ for users to discover events, find information and buy tickets.

external_links.title: Ents24 - the home of live events and ticketing on the web?
